subject: I am writing to you with a 100
body:
I am writing to you with a 100% legitimate business preposition that is worth your time and consideration.
This preposition could be of immense value to you and I would like to discuss it with you in detail.
I understand how busy your schedule is, but I would highly appreciate if you could grant me a few moments
of your time. I promise that it will be more than worth it.
For any further information regarding this preposition, please feel free to reply to this email and I will furnish
you with all the necessary details.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
Sincerely,
Gong Wang

subject: Re: I am writing to you with a 100
body:
Dear Gong Wang,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I am intrigued by your proposal and would like to know more about this business opportunity. Could you please provide more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Beulah
